meanings.definition: Make or become bigger or more extensive.
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy food enlarges your muscles.
meanings.sent2: The balloon enlarges as more air is blown into it.
meanings.sent3: His exaggeration about the fish size enlarges with each retelling.
meanings.sent4: Her smile enlarges the room with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The telescope enlarges distant stars into clear view.

meanings.sent1: Regular exercise enlarges your strength over time.
meanings.sent2: The company plans to enlarge its production capacity next year.
meanings.sent3: The rumor about the alien invasion enlarges with each passing day.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter enlarges the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The storm enlarges in intensity as it approaches the coast.

meanings.definition: To make larger in size or volume.
meanings.sent1: Adding more flour enlarges the dough for the bread.
meanings.sent2: The architect decided to enlarge the windows for more natural light.
meanings.sent3: The children's excitement enlarges when they see the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: His kindness enlarges the hearts of those around him.
meanings.sent5: The artist enlarges the details of the painting to capture every brushstroke.
